title: Employee Engagement Improvement
content: It would be great to have more team-building activities throughout the year to increase employee engagement and morale.

title: Work-from-home Policy Suggestion
content: Could the company consider offering flexible work-from-home days? It would help employees maintain a better work-life balance.

title: Software Tools Update
content: The current project management tool we use is somewhat outdated. An upgrade or change to something more intuitive might increase productivity.

title: Feedback on HR Processes
content: It would be helpful to have a clearer and more streamlined process for providing feedback to HR on company-wide policies.
